name: Diablo III: Rise of the Necromancer
name_original: Diablo III: Rise of the Necromancer
description:
Diablo III: Rise of the Necromancer is a RPG game. It came out on 15-06-2017. Blizzard Entertainment published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Diablo III: Rise of the Necromancer on PC.
It was scored by Derek Duke, Erik Desiderio, Jason Hayes and Neal Acree.
